processingCommand.script:
! Stop modules
:SET &WMS_STOP#       = "false"
:SET &REFS_STOP#      = "false"
:SET &RW_STOP#        = "false"
:SET &EMS_STOP#       = "false"
:SET &WMS_FAIL_STOP#  = "false"
:SET &REFS_FAIL_STOP# = "false"
:SET &RW_FAIL_STOP#   = "false"
:SET &EMS_FAIL_STOP#  = "false"


:IF &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &WMS_STOP# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &REFS_STOP# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &EMS_STOP# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &RW_STOP# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &WMS_FAIL_STOP# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &REFS_FAIL_STOP# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &RW_FAIL_STOP# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &EMS_FAIL_STOP# = "true"
:ENDIF


:PUBLISH &WMS_STOP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_STOP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_STOP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_STOP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_FAIL_STOP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_FAIL_STOP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_FAIL_STOP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_FAIL_STOP#,,WORKFLOW
